definition: to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Finance and Administration includes various departments such as …
sentences.chinese: 財務與行政部包括許多不同的部門。

sentences.english: The lines can include transformations and other sexiness.
sentences.chinese: 這些線可以包括轉換以及其它吸引眼球的東西。

sentences.english: It has multiple regions that include dozens if not hundreds of branches.
sentences.chinese: 它遍及多個區域，每個區域包括幾十甚至上百家支行。

sentences.english: Bite valve cover protects from dirt and debris, includes a bite valve inside.
sentences.chinese: 咬合閥蓋保護閥遠離灰塵和碎片，包括內置咬氣門芯。

sentences.english: Football is played in all weathers, including rain and snow.
sentences.chinese: 可以在氣候下玩橄欖球，包括雨天和雪天。

sentences.english: Bugfix related to optimizing Far-field data including surface-wave.
sentences.chinese: 修正了相關的優化遠場數據，包括地面波。

sentences.english: Include the company details and your job title and responsibilities there.
sentences.chinese: 包括該公司的細節和您的職銜和責任。

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身體語言，已被廣泛地研究社會心理學。

sentences.english: Other ideas include encouraging guests to reuse towels and linens.
sentences.chinese: 其他措施包括鼓勵客人重複使用毛巾和牀單。

sentences.english: My extracurricular activities include the Math and Drama Clubs.
sentences.chinese: 我的課餘活動包括參加數學興趣小組和戲劇社。

sentences.english: The total collection books excludes the books for rental.
sentences.chinese: 圖書種數不包括租型圖書。

sentences.english: Comparisons with our previous studies on the Yami children were included in the present report.
sentences.chinese: 本報告中亦包括與蘭嶼學童調查結果之比較。

sentences.english: These strategies include buying raw materials in bulk and by mechanizing their operations.
sentences.chinese: 這些策略包括購買原材料和散裝機械化經營。

sentences.english: But the polis also included the surrounding farmland, and the villages.
sentences.chinese: 一座希臘城市還包括周邊的農田村莊。

sentences.english: Failure to include substantiating facts and figures on the market is likely to result in a Fail grade.
sentences.chinese: 不包括充實市場上的事實和數字是可能導致故障品位。

sentences.english: All their costs, including study and living expenses, will be covered by the fund.
sentences.chinese: 包括通信費在內的大部分支出，都會由公司支付。

definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
